page.title: 06Cuxton Social Club
page.content: Cuxton Social Club, which was opened in 1922, is a place where families can enjoy a pleasant evening together. Subscriptions are Â£5.25 a year, with an entry fee of 45p. Everyone over 16 years of age is eligible to join, but the Club is restricted to 700 members. The busiest times are Saturday evening, Sunday lunchtime and evening. The most popular drink is "AK" which is a light beer, and the most popular games are darts and snooker. Other sub-sections of the Club include football, cricket, golf, bat and trap, and horticulture. Every year a children's Christmas party is held. Since its beginning the Club has been extended and improved and is now very comfortable, with thick carpets and plush chairs.
